enter_category_name: Enter the name of the new category
category_name_help: You can choose a unique name for this category
category_description_help: You can add a description of the category of about 50 words.
minimum_tags_help: Minimum tags required to create a post
maximum_tags_help: Limits a user to use only a limited number of tags
tags_help: These tags will be visible to the users while they create post in this category
alt_text_help: Displayed when the image fails to load
parent_category_help: You can select only one parent category. Remember this will be nested under its parent.
